name: Create new DocuGenerate PDFs from new Google Sheets spreadsheet rows
description:
Every time a new row is added to a Google Sheets spreadsheet, Make will automatically generate a PDF document using DocuGenerate.
This example uses the "Sales Contract" sample template and data from DocuGenerateâ€™s [Template Library](https://www.docugenerate.com/templates/).
You can easily customize this workflow with your own templates and spreadsheet data.
Created by DocuGenerate. [Contact us](mailto:support@docugenerate.com) if you have any questions.
